reviews.review: sweet game, i like the girls in it

counter strike is amazing game if you have four friends who you can rely on... team can explore many possibilities.. and can be fun.. I played the game on wrong medicine for some years in mm with very toxic comunity and got almost to the top couple times. That's why mm people are not the real challenge... if u want more. I wasted time in this game but I survived with something to do. For new people i suggest don't play mm, nothing in it. 
Learn maps, aim, movement, nades, everything.. and for best experience go esea with friends, manage! or don't play it
If your good at it go for more every moment
Ranks.. individuals not important, teamwork first, a lot of training the mouse.. and everything follows..
.. the last guy in team is the first.. 
.. good instant information are kills.. 
.. and maybe you are born for this, having a great time... most important.. 
...
